# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text)
    line = ""
    wrapped_text = ""
    
    for word in words
        if length(line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            wrapped_text *= line * "\n"
            line = word
        else
            if length(line) > 0
                line *= " "
            end
            line *= word
        end
    end
    
    wrapped_text *= line * "\n"
    return wrapped_text
end

# Example
println(wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines"))
```
